key_risks: Dependency on Toyota Motor Corporation for revenue

Health initiatives and global skills competition

sources.title: Toyota Subsidiary Loses $37 Million Due to BEC Scam
sources.snippet: A European subsidiary of the company, Toyota Boshoku Corporation, was targeted by hackers as part of a business email compromise (BEC) scam.
